sentences.sentence: All his life he fought to free himself from fear solitarily and he made it!
sentences.translation: 他一生孤独的为摆脱恐惧的自由而战，并且最终获得了自由！

sentences.sentence: Living solitarily makes people relax, but loneliness is unacceptable by human nature.
sentences.translation: 静处一隅人们可以放松享受，但孤独又是人性不可接受的。

sentences.sentence: They are far away from their hometown parents, comes to Guangzhou, Shenzhen solitarily, but also has places such as Beijing, Shanghai.
sentences.translation: 他们远离自己的家乡父母，只身来到广州、深圳，还有北京、上海等地。
